resources.string: "Please select one of the following food types by choosing from the options menu in the top right hand corner:"

"Shown below are our selection of vegetables offered at Kevin's Klean Kantene. Please select your items and press the button below to proceed to checkout.Alternatively, you can select another food type from the menu in the top right hand corner.\n\nPlease note that you can only order one serving of each menu item. We use only the rarest and finest ingredients in the food we serve to our customers :)."

"Shown below are our selection of fruits offered at Kevin's Klean Kantene. Please select your items and press the button below to proceed to checkout.Alternatively, you can select another food type from the menu in the top right hand corner.\n\nPlease note that you can only order one serving of each menu item. We use only the rarest and finest ingredients in the food we serve to our customers :)"
